name: Elemental - God's Prison
description:
Imprisoned by mortals son of ancient god has to escape his eternal prison and take revenge on human kind to start a new cycle of world's history.

Project status:

This is an early demo version of our game. It contains first 10 levels. Please remember that this is an alpha demo and can has some issues. 

If you like our project, please support us!

Controls:

W, S, A, D - move.
Space - jump.
E - dematerialize and use things.
Mouse scroll - change material type.
Left mouse button - materialize.
Right mouse button - cancel materializing.
F5 - restart level.

Languages: English, Polish

Authors:

Design & Programming: Artur Mathes
3D Art: Krzysztof Knysak (ArtStation page)
Music: Bartłomiej Alberski
